paragraphs.text: Sia's video: let's be wary of seeing paedophilia everywhere.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Australian musician Sia has apologised to anyone "triggered" by her video for Elastic Heart, featuring Shia LaBeouf and 12-year-old dance prodigy Maggie Ziegler, dancing together, in flesh-coloured outfits (Ziegler sporting a platinum Sia wig), in a cage
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The video has caused uproar in some quarters
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Fame-averse Sia(who generally performs with her face hidden) tweeted:"I anticipated some 'paedophilia!!!' cries for this video
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: All I can say is Maddie and Shia are two of the only actors I felt could play these two warring 'Sia self states'"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: adding that her intention was to "create some emotional content, not to upset anybody"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: The video is jarring
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Famously troubled LaBeouf and Ziegler dance around, wrestling, attacking, playing
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: At one point, LaBeouf holds Ziegler aloft
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: at another, he tries to stroke her and she kicks and hisses to get away
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Elsewhere, Ziegler wraps her tiny limbs around LaBeouf in a feral grip
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Watching it, I realised that the intensity(Sia's "emotional content") was the reason it was jarring - the mere fact that the video wasn't carefully benign, cheaply titillating or just plain boring, like so much else in the genre
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In Elastic Heart, the grown man and the young girl are alive with feelings for each other, running the gamut from amusement and play through to fury to despair
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: What isn't there is sexuality
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In fact
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it baffles me how anyone could look seriously at Elastic Heart and claim to see any sexual content whatsoever
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Can't a grown man and a young girl produce art with edge and beauty of any kind without a squalid sexual subtext instantly being read into it?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Sia seemed to apologise for potentially triggering memories of child sex abuse and grooming
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: (as some accused her of doing, on behalf of abuse victims)
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Of course we all sympathise with abuse victims
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: However, one would imagine that such triggers would be everywhere - perhaps mainly focused on the most ordinary and domestic of situations
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: All of which couldn't be further away from a highly choreographed performance of an arty cage dance
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: If
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: some abuse survivors were genuinely disturbed by Elastic Heart then fair enough, but what about those who referred to it as an excuse for their own unease?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Are these people aware that Ziegler performed solo, dressed identically, dancing similarly, for Sia's Chandelier video
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Did this talented young dancer remind them of child sex abuse then?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: If not, is it because LaBeouf was in Elastic Heart
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: - so
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: presumably a woman performing the same dance with Ziegler would have been perfectly fine
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Is this where we are now: society flinching from the sight of a man and a girl performing together in any way that hasn't been entirely emotionally neutered?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Ultimately, this discomfort seems wrapped up in our own dirty, addled, increasingly paranoid 21st-century mindset, in which paedophilia, once so grotesquely secretive, is now seen everywhere and in the most kneejerk fashion
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: No one could complain about increased awareness of abuse
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: which means that children are finally protected and believed
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Such instincts come from a good (better informed) place
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the situation has surely become overcooked when paedophilia becomes one of the first things we presume and in the most ludicrous settings
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It becomes so that everything, even art, is expected to distil and accommodate all the retrospective guilt of bygone eras: the fact that so many perpetrators of the past weren't caught, that we were lax, not observant or protective enough
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In some ways, it's good not to forget
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: in others, perhaps we need to get past it
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The latter is true of Elastic Heart - a video found to be offensive because of sanctioned hysteria, rather than anything happening on screen
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: all the more disturbing when set against the wider background of any artist being scared into silence or self-censorship
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Sia should not have been badgered into an apology
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: She had nothing to apologise for
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Russia has listed transsexual and transgender people as no longer being allowed to qualify for driving licences
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: They are to be classed as having "mental disorders"
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: which would also include exhibitionism, voyeurism and fetishism of any kind
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: (others include compulsive gambling and stealing)
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The official line is that this is because there are too many road accidents in Russia and tightening medical controls has become necessary
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Russian psychiatrists and human rights lawyers have condemned the move
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: which appears to follow on from the infamous 2013 legislation that made the promotion of "non-traditional lifestyles" illegal
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Barring a person from driving for no good reason is a serious matter
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: It takes away not only a civilian right but also a prime symbol of adult autonomy
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: never mind the real logistical difficulties that being car-less might present in parts of Russia
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It also means that people who might feel that they'd benefit from some degree of psychiatric counselling would feel less inclined to do so if they feared losing their cars
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: What a farce
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There are some of us who would like it proved that a certain Vladimir Putin is mentally fit to ride that horse he is often(and so sexily!) perched upon
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There are shots I've seen where he looks quite thrillingly "barking", bobbing about on his saddle, with no top on, brandishing a rifle like the big he-man he oh so obviously is
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: More seriously, this reminds us that it's still important to keep abreast of Russian moves such as these
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Big and small, these laws represent blatant targeting of minorities and cynical affronts to international human rights
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This latest one is yet another shift towards the blanket criminalisation of anything other than blessed, state-ordained heterosexuality
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We must keep watching
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I go pretty low with television, lower than is dignified
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: even
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I have never watched The Jump
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: the Channel 4 reality show where low-rent celebrities compete in a variety of winter sports, with the slowest two each week being made to perform a ski jump to decide who will be eliminated
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: There are always casualties during training
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This time, Ola Jordan, of Strictly Come Dancing, injured her knee so badly that it threatens her dancing career
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The Speaker's wife, Sally Bercow, also injured herself - her ribs, not her gob
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: so
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: she'll be able to carry on just fine
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We all accept this kind of caper as "normal", but on what premise is such dangerous and sadistic television justified?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: I thought Splash! was irresponsible(unfit semi-famous people falling off high-diving boards after minimal training)
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: But ski jumping - are they kidding?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: A test of mettle, my derriere; this is Lord of the Flies with frostbite
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Why don't programme makers go the whole hog and push C-listers into fast-moving traffic and allow viewers to vote on who gets squelched by an articulated lorry the fastest?
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: If people dislike celebrities, then fine, but breaking their bones should be off limits
paragraphs.label: assumption
